chronicles.title: The Kindness That Refused To Harden
chronicles.subtitle: How does the heart decide to stay soft when it has every reason to harden? I cannot hate you, even knowing that loving me is something you cannot give, because what I feel was never built on conditions or outcomes. I love you so much that it exists quietly...

chronicles.title: HEART DEBUG SESSION : FROY.
chronicles.subtitle: When attachment formed faster than two lives could hold..

chronicles.title: Reminder from 'froy' for you.
chronicles.subtitle: Please eat well, sleep well, take care of yourself. We don't speak a lot, but know I am always here for you, got you.

chronicles.subtitle: A voice reaches through the darkness, trying to stay awake in the midst of a heavy night. Two people support each other while chaos lives outside the room: fear, family wounds, and the echo of words that cut too deep. One searches for proof of existence, rep......
